Reviews.Title: “Not an expected 5 star hotel!”
Reviews.Author: SmS089
Reviews.Content: We had a trip to Istanbul on March 2012. It was a great city with a lot of historic places, beaches and some lovely streets. It was a nice place which deserves to visit once more. But the Crown Plaza Harbiye..!! We thought of a 5 star hotel, but it was a little less than a 4 star! We had 4 rooms and room service showed one magic of terrible service for each day after day! First day there was no tooth brush in 2 rooms, the other day the face towels were omitted in my room, another day we left our room in the morning by the need for cleaning sign at the door, but when we came back in the evening the sign was still hanged outside and no sign of cleaning could be seen inside!! But on the other hand, they had good-tempered personnel, nice pool, fair beakfast place with not so much different options in dishes, just acceptable. The best part was the short distance from Taqsim square, but the worst part was Dolapdere street where the hotel is located and all around you were full of car repair shops! Any way it was not a bad trip but I had more dreams of a 5 star international hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel, bad location”
Reviews.Author: Monica G
Reviews.Content: The hotel is nice, but the location is not. Large rooms, good and variate food, staff not very good in english. Lot of car services in the neighbourhood, with the correspondent noise and smell. Wherever you want to go, you have to take a taxi. And taxis are a real adventure, so take care. I stayed here for 3 nights.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel terrible location”
Reviews.Author: Ellesor826
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for 2 nights while on a tour of Turkey. The location is not good at all, the hotel itself is an oasis amidst the car repair shops and mannequin stores ...really. The rooms are quite spacious and well appointed, however during our stay the rooms were quite stuffy and warm as the heating system was still operating. One needs to turn left only up the hill to see some inner-city stores and some restaurants. We were advised not to turn right out of the hotel as it is not a good area and pick pockets rampant. To be honest, if given a choice, I would not stay in this location.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible location”
Reviews.Author: EPB69120
Reviews.Content: The hotel is very nice, so is the staff. No complaints other than the room and the location of the hotel. You had to take a taxi to go anywhere. There were no shops outside the hotel and it is located in a seedy neighborhood.

Reviews.Title: “the good atmospher and great breakfast”
Reviews.Author: mahsa p
Reviews.Content: it was very good hotel with good employers and managment. but the hotel wasn't in good street, it was full of repair shop and it hasn't good view. it was 5 minute taxi riding to taksim squere. the rooms was clean and modern but the air conditioner wasn't hot very much, i was there in 28th january-2 feb. breakfast was good too, full of breads, great olives, good cheeses, and it was so good. take a great treap in this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “bad location spcially in winter and with children”
Reviews.Author: jalalzavareh
Reviews.Content: the hotel is located in down of hill . it is right that distance to metro station is 650 meter but it is a high slop uphill it is difficult for eldrly in addition during this distance are lots of car repair shop. on the other hand hotel was so kind and helpfull

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel with a very good management”
Reviews.Author: Niyusha S
Reviews.Content: It is one of the best hotels that I had seen; I was very relax, I was in this hotel for one week started in 29th -6th January 2012. The employees of this hotel are really polite with very good service espicially in time of serving breakfast. The breakfast is complete and the employees are very careful to serve the guests with the best way. Although it was a little difficult for old people to go to the center of city but it was near to the famous shopping centers. By taxi, it is just 5 minutes not more. The rooms are very clean and modern and the employees check to see if the guests need their room to be cleaned more. It is very calm and no sound. I liked it.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful and modern hotel”
Reviews.Author: kceesse
Reviews.Content: Pros - Just 5 minute taxi ride from the Taksim Square, which is a very popular and fashionable shopping district (but watch out for dishonest taxi drivers who would overcharge 3x) - Very modern hotel with beautiful and comfortable decor and furnishings - Staff were very friendly throughout - Complimentary wi-fi - Shower water pressure strong - Bed was comfortable Cons - Slow wi-fi in room - Dinner buffet options were surprisingly poor (only around 6 hot options) and the food was the "cheap" kind - Small restaurant could potentially mean long queues for breakfast - Many rooms face an narrow interior courtyard with very limited views and quite dim during the day Overall, highly recommended

Reviews.Title: “Disappointing & Over Priced Product, unlike Crowne Plaza”
Reviews.Author: S A
Reviews.Content: One IHG hotel we know we will never return to or recommend!Great reception service, really good crew there. Everything else is wrong. The biggest problem was the House Keeping. Cleaning was poor, never replenished items (mind you we were in an upgraded superior room), removed our own copy of room card so when we came back our key would not bring electricity on, we found our laptop was locked by wrong trials of password, the VIP kit we were supposed to get never reached us. The room temperature was set to too high and no choice was available. over all,an overpriced disappointing product. Have written to the management, as I am a priority club member, at this stage awaiting response.

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel strange location”
Reviews.Author: aeilat
Reviews.Content: This is a new hotel- got a very pleasant room. The main issue is location (street noise, mandates a taxi, not really convenient to walk by). This is a good stay for business, but I wouldn't go there if were a tourist.

Reviews.Title: “New Hotel in Central Turkey”
Reviews.Author: R L
Reviews.Content: This is a brand new hotel when I stayed in April 2011. It has just opened a week ago. Beware that many taxi drivers will think you want Crowne Plaza Old City as not many are aware of this hotel. The room is nice and clean. Huge floor to ceiling windows gives extra light into the room. I particularly like the eletric curtain which you can control from your bed. The view is nothing spectacular. It overlooks some old houses. The hotel is located next to a quite busy road. Walk up a very steep hill and you will find a monorail station that takes you into Taksim. The breakfast is reasonable. Typical western hotel, not much variety like the eastern 5 star hotels. Staff are extremely friendly. When I was there the pool and gym has just opened. A nice indoor pool and gym has all the mod cons you ever wanted. As the hotel was brand new when I was there, there was no restaurant to eat. Even the room menu was just a printed A4 piece of paper as they haven't done the menu properly yet. Nothing much to do in the vicinity of the hotel. No restaurants nearby. There are some Turkish bar place which I never venture in.

Reviews.Title: “Pretty good hotel, with a few problems..”
Reviews.Author: JohnOGrots
Reviews.Content: I stayed here, mid October and just to address what others have mentioned about the location; yes it may not be ideal and not Taksim, but to be fair, much of Istanbul looks like this and though it may look suspect, I walked around at night without any problems. Service was good, especially room service. Front desk service felt like they were usually a bit too busy to attend to your needs. My air conditioner crapped out and after 3 calls, there was no engineer to come to fix. it eventually took a 4th call before someone turned up... (at 2am!). One final thing, the walls are paper thin! you can hear everything in the next room. One evening i was making a phone call, not too late.. around 11pm, i heard a couple of thumps on the wall as if they were telling me to shut up! i wasn't even raising my voice! All in all, not bad.. but for the price I paid, I expected better!

Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel but terrible location”
Reviews.Author: Nida1504
Reviews.Content: I spent 2 nights at this hotel in March this year. The rooms were very spacious; the hotel is very modern and big. I stayed with half board, and the both meals were delicious. Only one thing I didnâ€™t like about itâ€¦ and that is the location. Every time I wanted to reach the city old center, I had to change 3 transportation busses and one funicular. If the hotel is near the business center you want to reach, then I recommend it, but if you want to visit Istanbul, and better chose a hotel in the old city center were the most attractions are.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel but far away from the center”
Reviews.Author: Nida1504
Reviews.Content: I spent 2 nights at this hotel in March this year. The rooms were very spacious; the hotel is very modern and big. I stayed with half board, and the both meals were delicious. Only one thing I didnâ€™t like about itâ€¦ and that is the location. Every time I wanted to reach the city old center, I had to change 3 transportation busses and one funicular. If the hotel is near the business center you want to reach, then I recommend it, but if you want to visit Istanbul, and better chose a hotel in the old city center were the most attractions are.

Reviews.Title: “Friendly helpful staff and clean rooms”
Reviews.Author: Gabycalvehider
Reviews.Content: This crowne plaza in harbiye is near taksim in the new part of the city. The road it is on is quite ugly but you are not far away from istiklal cadessi in taksim that is a major attraction for restaurants, bars and shopping. The taxi will only cost you 6 TL. The staff are friendly and willing to help, very polite, completely different to the other crowneplaza in Istanbul the old city one. They will also acknowledge you if you are an elite gold priority member, will allow you to use the executive club and will serve alcohol and quite good food. If you want to go to sultanahmed the taxi will cost about 20 or 30 TL so it' s not too bad. The rooms are modern, clean and reasonably roomy. We stayed there as part of the insight tour treasures of turkey.

Reviews.Title: “Okey hotel but bad location”
Reviews.Author: swedishtravellers
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for one night. The hotel itself is quite nice and modern, the rooms are large and also the bathrooms are nice and big. But the location is not so good. The area is not so nice and it is not easy to get to. On the internet homepage of the hotel there is information stating that Taksim square is within walking distance but this is not so true, it takes about 15 minutes to walk there. If you want to go somewhere you either need to take a taxi or walk to the metro station, it takes about two minutes. So if you like travelling with metro itÂ´s okey. If you prefer a high standard hotel before location you can choose this hotel. But if location is very important, donÂ´t stay here.

Reviews.Title: “Upgraded into a beautiful suite on the 8th floor”
Reviews.Author: worldtravelertrainer
Reviews.Content: I was in Istanbul for a global conference with my Organization and I can't say enough about the accommodations, the breakfasts and lunches, and the conference venue. All in all the staff were wonderful, the rooms amazing, and the free wireless a bonus. While the hotel is not exactly near the Old Town, we enjoyed walking over to Taksim at night where there were plenty of restaurants to choose from, and when we felt more adventurous, we took a cab over to the Old Town, and Ayasofya Mosque area -- (20 mins max). I highly recommend the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Stylish rooms, very good staff”
Reviews.Author: hopalong
Reviews.Content: Rooms are spacious and stylish. I found staff to be excellent overall - they will look after you especially if you are an elite PC member. Was upgraded to Club level superior room with lounge access. Free water is provided with the room plus tea/coffee facilities. Free wifi internet is available. Continental breakfast in the lounge was reasonable, though coffee machine was a bit tempremental. In the evening they have some light snacks as well. The lounge is quite compact but also has a small roof terrace. Room service was quick and the food quality was good. Location is fine if you don't mind walking - but that's as much to do with the city's disjointed public transport network. Go up the steep alley opposite the hotel - at the top turn right for Taksim Square (10-15mins walk) or go left up to the shopping street and Osmanbey metro station. The area around the hotel is a bowl which seems to magnify the traffic noise somewhat, despite the double glazing and the pink blinds. The hotel is quite a new property and is probably still finding its identity in Istanbul. If you like everything on your doorstep then this is probably not for you, otherwise a reasonable choice if you find a good rate. Note, taxi from the hotel to the Galata bridge costs around 14TL and to Ataturk airport about 40TL.

Reviews.Title: “Decent hotel, average location”
Reviews.Author: Fed S
Reviews.Content: This Crown Plaza is ok for business, not great for leisure. It's location is just far enough from Taksim square to make inconvenient - it's a 15 minute walk, without much on the way. Cabs are cheap but traffic can be bad. The rooms are spacious. I was upgraded on arrival and had a large corner room that was very comfortable. With good amenities. Breakfast is full service but when small and it always seemed full and busy. It's average... there's nothing that stands out and not much to complain about either.

Reviews.Title: “four stars hotel with three stars service”
Reviews.Author: mariop79
Reviews.Content: this hotel location is actually not bad especially if you have car and someone to drive you..but Ä±f you expect to use public transport this is certainly not a good options. room it self is very nice with a very comfortable bed.. its a pÄ±ty staff of this hotel is not very well traÄ±ned and its dÄ±fferent with other Crown prÄ±nce Ä± stay before.. management of thishotel should give more trainÄ±ng for staff of this hotel

Reviews.Title: “A 4 star hotel in a 2 star location”
Reviews.Author: Arneby
Reviews.Content: A strange feeling it was to roll up to a brand new four star americanized property in the middle of a way too narrow street not at all suitable for buses and taxis to stop all the time. Even in the highest rooms you are well overlooked by the shanty houses and minarets on the hill on other side of the street. Styling is Austin Powers meets Las Vegas meets hotel Intourist in CCCP Moscow. Whitewares from Kohler and american door knobs mixed with german and turkish tech. Standard rooms are ... well, standard.Fully electric vertical blinds are good as is the breakfast buffÃ©. Wireless internet is actually ok (once you get a new password) but of course behind the great turkish firewall.

Reviews.Title: “ALERT : Fraud Case From Crown Plaza (Harbyi) Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: NourQ
Reviews.Content: on the 17th of July we were welcomed by the receptionist at the front desk in the hotel and were informed that there is no available family rooms at the hotel. However, and with that said the receptionistâ€™s solution was to provide us with two rooms as the pre-reserved room was not available and asked for a deposit in which I handed & trusted your untrustworthy hotel with my visa card to be surprised to receive more than 3 transactions from the hotel on my VISA after two months from checking out . IF YOU EVER DEAL WITH THIS HOTEL DONT GIVE THEM YOUR VISA AS A DEPOSIT AS THEY WILL USE IT LATER ON AFTER CHECKING OUT FROM THE HOTEL

Reviews.Title: “Very Comfortable Hotel”
Reviews.Author: jmmlaguna
Reviews.Content: Brand new hotel with very comfortable rooms. We were upgraded to a French Deluxe room (2220 - on the 12th floor) and loved the room. The bed was very comfortable, the swivel flat panel worked great with the separate living area, the air conditioning worked well, bathroom was great with double sinks and rainfall shower, we loved the blackout automatic blinds! Staff was outstanding, we were constantly greeted and asked if we needed any assistance; Anil at the front desk checked us in and warmly greeted us by name every time we passed the front desk. Ahmet the bellboy was always smiling and extremely helpful. Semiha and Burak in the concierge lounge were outstanding hosts. The concierge lounge was a great area; we only saw a few other guest over our five nights at the hotel. Continental Breakfast in the lounge was very nice, it seemed the chef would come up to replace an item every time something was taken. In the evening a plate of Turkish Specialties was provided to each guest with complementary wine, beer, and cocktails. Location is good; only a five minute walk to Osmanbey Metro, ten minute walk to Nisantasi/Tesvikiye, fifteen minute walk to Taksim. Dolapderde Cad is not a very attractive street, but the area felt very safe and was convenient to other areas. The street is mainly auto repair shops and light industrial.

Reviews.Title: “amazing”
Reviews.Author: MustaphaEido
Reviews.Content: a very nice quite hotel even that it was full when i stayed there and a few meters from the osmanbey metro station but was a bit challenge walk up to the station cause of the steep street . however it was a very nice stay and the hotel had a very nice polite efficient staff .. i wanted to have a room with a view and i asked for changing and i had upgraded to the club level thanks excellent receptionists mr Yusef Baris and mr Anil they were very helpful and glad to answer any question with their smiling face that made me feel welcomed any time .. the breakfast was superb... it was an excellent stay there thanks to the wonderful staff .

Reviews.Title: “Not going back there!”
Reviews.Author: hbroamer
Reviews.Content: In summary, the inside of the hotel istself is OK but I would never stay there again. Here is why: 1) The hotel is in a bad neighborhood. There are strip clubs and auto repair shops (dirty ones), and run down buildings all around. 2) Walking into the hotel is like walking into an airport with an x-ray scanner, hand wand, and handbag inspections...It gets annoying after a few days. You'd think they get to know your face (and they do) but you are not spared. 3) We ddin't feel at home. The staff watchful eyes follwoing our every move every time we walked in or out. 4) They only make up the beds in the room and replace the towels. They DON'T vaccum the carpet nor clean the bathroom floor. 5) We took the "crowne plaza" taxi and he gave us the "tourist route", if you know what I mean. We took the same route with a non-crowne plaza taxi and it took 6 mins for 10TL. With the Crowne Plaza taxi, it took 15 mins for 20TL.. 6) Meals are very expesive at this hotel and they are not worth it. 7) A few of the staff are very polite but most are just plain RUDE!

Reviews.Title: “All Staff should get 5 star rating”
Reviews.Author: robmat_11
Reviews.Content: Whilst around 10 mins by cab to the old city, this very new modern hotel made up for any location issues in friendliness and 6* service, "Congratulations to all concerned", from the moment our shuttle arrived at the front entry, every staff member provided polite helpful assistance, the front office staff and consierge were simply amazing (only ever equalled by the staff at Crowne Plaza Kuala Lumpur), showing us to our clean modern well appointed upgraded room (Priority Club Platinum member), fully explained all room amenities and functions, assistance with location and taxi guidance and driver instructions (seperate note that Istanbul has worst taxi driver ripoffs ever experienced in all our travels, be warned !!!), when expresso machine wasn't working properly in club lounge and although ordinary perculated coffee was available, without being asked staff brought complimentary cuppachino's up 21 floors as part of their fantastic service, cannot say enough about this very memorable accommodation experience, all staff take a bow, thank you again

Reviews.Title: “Great staff”
Reviews.Author: 351pete
Reviews.Content: My stay in Crowne Plaza Istanbul Harbiye was a very good one. Right from the start, and since Iâ€™m Platinum on Priority Club, got an upgraded room which was excellent. Free wi-fi is available, which is always a plus. Staff was also great, always making you feel welcome and attending your every needs. Recommended.

Reviews.Title: “That's what I call an improvement”
Reviews.Author: Medy82
Reviews.Content: I've stayed in CP Harbiye 3 months ago when they were a freshly opened hotel. Now all I can say is, they improved alot. There have been few problems back then with my room having no robe or staff can't speak english properly. 3 months later hotel changed alot. Now staff is very friendly, talks english very fluently and room quality is top notch. From the comments of others, all I can see is criticism. As a hotel guest, criticism is very natural as you would like to get the the service you deserve but they are all missing the point that hotel was very fresh and unlike the other hotels, they decided to test hotel from guest reviews. And now when I look back, my review has changed alot. They gave me a satisfaction test which was decent back then. And now, like I said it's top notch. Every hotel deserves a second chance, and from my second trip, all I can say is, CP Harbiye didn't let me down.

Reviews.Title: “Clean, beautiful rooms with a professional yet friendly staff, and only a 10 minute walk to Taksim Square.”
Reviews.Author: YazMaTaz
Reviews.Content: A girl friend and I stayed at this hotel for about 4 nights. We felt safe as there was plenty of professional english speaking staff, including security, and two great concierges, a lady whose name I forget and Anil. They helped us with our travel arrangements to Cappadocia and showed us the authentic restaurants and local bars worth visiting. It was a fairly new hotel but yet didn't show any signs of disorganization. The beds were so comfortable and the rain shower head was so nice! The room was big with a beautiful distant view of the city, will the necessary amenities such as coffee, tea, hair dryer, etc. Just one small thing, the wifi connection in our room was not strong enough for my android phone whereas my friend's worked fine. I had to go into the sitting area in our hallway or down to the lobby to use the internet. It was a short walk to the main square and, although at night the area seemed a bit sketchy, it was perfectly safe.

Reviews.Title: “Never stay here - terrible location”
Reviews.Author: AndrewJ167
Reviews.Content: Of course, the offering is entirely consistent and what you would expect of Crowne Plaza. The bedrooms are comfortable - though mostly inward facing and dark. The beds and pilows are extremely comfortable. Service is fine, with some staff having english. But this hotel is in a terrible area - on a road - a very steep hill - which is entirely motor repair shops. You can only get anywhere by taxi. The taxis mostly don't know how to get to the hotel. One taxi driver refused us a ride 'very bad area, very bad people'. Clearly the hotel has very low occupancy. What joker in IHG management put together the deal which took this hotel into the IHG portoflio? It's a bad mark against the brand and against IHG. Wake up IHG, watch your carefully nurtured brand.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel for business visit”
Reviews.Author: egoaustralia
Reviews.Content: Brand new hotel. Everything clean and new. Location - the street it is in is not a tourist street. So 10-15 min walk to Taksim sqr but it is a steep walk of 150m to the main road. Good location with taxi (5 to 10 turkish lira) no problem, to main places . No facilitating shops outside the hotel. want something then need to walk the steep road to the main road or take taxi. Service and facilities - hotel staff is very nice and mostly speak good English. Don't get advise from the concierge, he only thinks about is commission. free wifi throughout the hotel although some locations week signal. nice swim pool and gym, restaurant and seating areas. Overall very nice hotel. Room - we where upgraded, I don't know from what to the Club floor. the room is with 2 double beds. It is everything you expect from a good room of 4 or 5 star hotel. Only things was in the TV system, speciality built for hotels, there were no movies loaded and no music loaded into the special channels. tv channels are in turkish and you also get the main news channels in English. Maybe with time it will be sorted. 2 of us came for an exhibition at the expo cnr next to the airport. 30-40 min drive and about 50 lira. hotel cost 200 euro a night with breaky. not cheap but then the other hotels are not cheap too. If you come on business great. I am not sure with the family giving the bit of walk to the centre. depends at the family structure and what deal you get.

Reviews.Title: “Superb brand new property in Istanbul”
Reviews.Author: sm105
Reviews.Content: The Crowne Plaza Istanbul is a welcome addition to the roster of business hotels on the European side of Istanbul. The property is brand new and fitted out in an extremely elegant design. The "French Deluxe" Room that I had reserved was huge, with a separate sitting area from the bedroom, a flat screen TV and a jacuzzi tub in the bathroom. Complimentary hi-speed wireless internet was also available throughout the property. The location is excellent, within 5 minutes walking distance of both Taksim and the Metro station at Osmanbey. I was also able to walk to/from my business meetings in Tesvikiye. Staff were very helpful with directions and negotiating with taxi drivers. Overall a superb property and a wonderful stay.

Reviews.Title: “The worst hotel i have been in my life”
Reviews.Author: MTavakoliG
Reviews.Content: bad enough. I have just telling you the issues which we have faced them. Electricity ran off twice a day. No privacy, you can hear whispers of the other rooms. House keeping do not clean the room really. Restaurant just have club sandwiches to offer you. staff can not understand English. Testing fire alarm while we were staying in the hotel. Testing Generator and make the air pollution while we are inside.

HotelInfo.Name: Crowne Plaza Istanbul Harbiye
HotelInfo.Address: Dolapderde Cad. 161 Sisli, Istanbul 34375, Turkey
